QuestData.Title: An Act of Kindness
QuestData.Description: I know that you and Vindicator Yrel are here on important matters, but I must ask you a favor.$B$BA squad of rangari left on patrol just before the poisonous mist set in.$B$BIf they were caught out in the swamp, they are surely in trouble.$B$BHarvest the Restorative Goldcaps growing among the reeds, and use them to restore any fallen rangari that you find.$B$BIf you find yourself in trouble, eat one to combat the poison.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Restorative Goldcaps to revive fallen rangari.
